dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4433688J] DMCA ISP Notification www.compumusic.com /Sony DSC
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2007 7:33 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4433688J] DMCA ISP Notification www.compumusic.com /Sony DSC ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA ISP Notification www.compumusic.com /Sony DSC Added by system at Wednesday, Jun 6 2007 12:23 pm X-MailFrom: Notifications@netenforcers.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Jun 6 12:23:26 2007 Received: (qmail 31606 invoked by alias); 6 Jun 2007 17:23:26 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 31603 invoked from network); 6 Jun 2007 17:23:24 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 6 Jun 2007 17:23:24 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 06 Jun 2007 12:23:24 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from Notifications@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HvxtB-0001if-Ve for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Wed, 06 Jun 2007 10:57:38 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 6 Jun 2007 10:56:47 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 6 Jun 2007 10:54:01 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Notifications@netenforcers.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Hvxph-0006k2-1L; Wed, 06 Jun 2007 10:54:01 -0500 Received: from wsip-24-249-184-236.ph.ph.cox.net ([24.249.184.236] helo=netenforcers.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Notifications@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HvxpV-000KhO-5Z; Wed, 06 Jun 2007 10:53:49 -0500 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Subject: DMCA ISP Notification www.compumusic.com /Sony DSC MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; type="multipart/alternative"; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C7A852.DE29E0E2" Date: Wed, 6 Jun 2007 08:53:42 -0700 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Message-ID: <4D481D7D2583FF489EC67FCC76EFE7BC073998@nemail.NetEnforcers.local> X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: DMCA ISP Notification www.compumusic.com /Sony DSC thread-index: AceoUtruGi4oKpzwRGaJSLnvf7wTew== From: "Notifications" To: , , X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Jun 2007 15:54:01.0622 (UTC) FILETIME=[E6CB5B60:01C7A852] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) 6/6/2007 VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. George Poletes 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas TX 75207 Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials Dear Designated Agent: We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials. Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c) (3) (A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, compumusic.com, at the URL www.compumusic.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to DSC products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website. Specific violations of copyrighted images by compumusic.com are listed below this paragraph. http://www.compumusic.com/p216452.htm http://www.compumusic.com/i259043.htm http://www.compumusic.com/i212425.htm http://www.compumusic.com/i213159.htm http://www.compumusic.com/i213884.htm There are various additional locations of infringement on www.compumusic.com website. The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all infringements need to be addressed. Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) (1) (C), Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner. If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers' Compliance Management Department via voicemail or facsimile at 501-646-6242, or via email to Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. Sony DSC has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you. Please do not contact Sony DSC directly, as Sony DSC will simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers. If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 06/15/2007, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and we will proceed accordingly. Sincerely, VCLM Law Lance C. Venable Attorney at Law LCV/roc Compliance Management Net Enforcers, Inc Compliance.management@netenforcers.com MIME element (text/html)
 
 

 

6/6/2007

 

VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

 

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas TX 75207

 

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony
